Our History
Serving Delicious Local Seafood Established in 1954 with years of experience cooking the finest seafood, we love to showcase all types of local seafood dishes!
Happy Hour!
Everyday from 2pm -6pm
Enjoy Waterside Dining!
Dockside dining is always a delight in the Florida Keys. The 7 Mile Grill is located on the Bay side, so come by boat
We Serve Breakfast 7am - 12pm!
If you're on the go, call us TO GO!
Enjoy our Greek Specialties!
We make our food homemade with love!
We accommodate large parties!
7 Mile Grill is a locally and family-owned business that was founded in 1954. We’re a casual dockside eatery serving locals, travelers, families and friends.
We’re dedicated to creating wonderful surprises that you’ll absolutely love! When you visit our restaurant, you won’t believe your eyes with the incredible range of options that are available with us. We offer Mexican, German, Italian, Japanese cuisine and so much more! Our WORLD FAMOUS Key Lime Pie is made fresh daily with an unforgettable taste!
Our food is our passion! Without wonderful customers like you, our restaurant would never survive.
That’s why we’re sure to say “thank you” to everyone who gives us their business and support. We’re extremely thankful for our loyal customers and their love never falls short.
Visit 7 Mile Grill where you’ll always be treated like family. Warm smiles and welcome greetings are our number one guarantee.
Carryout and delivery options are available.
Our food taste as good as it looks!
Established
1954
A casual dockside eatery serving locals, travelers, families, and friends!
We are open
We are open 7am - 8pm except
Thursday 7am - 3pm
1240 Overseas Highway, Marathon, Florida 33050
(305) 743-4481
A Few of Our Delights!
Start Your Day With A Healthy Breakfast
Our Smoked Salmon Bagel has it all. Served with lettuce, tomato, onion & capers with a NY Bagel and cream cheese. MY PERSONAL FAVORITE
Enjoy The Waterside View With A Mimosa
Take your seat on one of our benches, sip on a mimosa, or 2, relax and enjoy Your Time.
Sustain With A Hearty Breakfast Sandwich
Choose your style of eggs, select your  favorite meat, add cheese, toasted bread and you’ve built your own Masterpiece !
Seafood Platters
There’s no doubt that our seafood platters are on top of your order list.
Broiled, blackened or fried you can’t go wrong.
Super, Major deliciousness!
Steaks
For the Meat Lovers!
Breakfast, lunch or dinner, with eggs & home fries, salad & fries, or just veggies.
If You Want One, Get One!
Fresh Salads
With or without your chosen topping, our salads are crisp, fresh and delightful.
Definitely try our home-made Greek dressing.
The Fish Sandwich
We are WORLD FAMOUS for our FRIED GROUPER SANDWICH
Whichever fish you select, blackened, grilled or fried, we will satisfy your, fish sandwich taste!
Authentic Greek Customer's Favorite
Our Chicken Souvlaki Platter is a hands down winner. Served, with both, our home-made Greek dressing & tzatziki sauce, this dish will complete you!
THE Gyro
Customers return over and over and rave about our Gyros. You”ll just have to come in and try one yourself!
Home-Made Greek Delights
It takes time, patience, only the best ingredients and a lot of love to make. It’s our
Beloved
Spanakopita.
Sink Your Teeth Into A Juicy Burger
8 oz of Prime ground beef , Hand Crafted with our Specials Seasonings.
All Burgers come with
LTO, Fries & a Pickle.
Split The Split !
Share this mountain of goodness or  have it all to yourself,  guaranteed to satisfy!
